title: vaiyya muzhudum
sahitya:
vaiyya muzhudum paDaittATTuginra mahAshakti tan aruL vAzhttuginrOm
 sheyyum vinaigaL anaittilumE veTri shErndiDa nallaruL sheigavenrE
 caraNam 2    bhUtangal-aindilirund-engum kaNNir-pulappaDum shaktiyaip-porukkinrOm
vEdangaL shonna paDikku manidarai mEnmaiyura sheidal vENDumenrE
 caraNam 3    vEgam kavarcci mudaliya palvinai mEviDum shaktiyai mEvuginrOm
Eka nilaiyil irukkum amrtattai yAngaLarindiDa vENDumenrE
 caraNam 4    uyirenat-tOnri uNavu koNDE vaLarndOngiDum shaktiyai pOTruginrOm
uyirinaik-kAkkum mazhaiyena engaLai bhAvittu nittamum vaLargavenrE
 caraNam 5    cittatilE ninru shErvaduNarum shivashakti tanpugazh ceppuginrOm
ittarai mIdinil inbamgaL yAvum emaikkut-terindiDal vENDumenrE
 caraNam 6    mArudalinri parAshakti tanpugazh vaiyamishai nittam pADuginrOm
nUru vayadu pugazhuDan vAzhttuyar nOkkangaL peTriDa vENDumenrE
 caraNam 7    Om shakti Om shakti Om shakti Om shakti Om shaktyenrurai sheidiDuvOm
Om shaktiyenbavar uNmai kaNDAr kaDar oNmai koNDAr uyir vaNmai koNDAr
